DATAFIELD.name: reviewer
DATAFIELD.selector: #REVIEWS > SECTION > DIV:nth-of-type(1) > DIV > DIV.bPhtn > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > SPAN > SPAN > DIV.dDwZb.f > DIV.bJyQA.f > DIV.cjhIj > SPAN > A

DATAFIELD.name: review_date
DATAFIELD.selector: #REVIEWS > SECTION > DIV:nth-of-type(1) > DIV > DIV.bPhtn > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > SPAN > SPAN > DIV.fEDvV

DATAFIELD.name: review_title
DATAFIELD.selector: #REVIEWS > SECTION > DIV:nth-of-type(1) > DIV > DIV.bPhtn > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > SPAN > SPAN > DIV.fEDvV

DATAFIELD.name: review_text
DATAFIELD.selector: #REVIEWS > SECTION > DIV:nth-of-type(1) > DIV > DIV.bPhtn > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > SPAN > SPAN > DIV.duhwe._T > DIV.pIRBV._T > DIV > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: rating
DATAFIELD.selector: #REVIEWS > SECTION > DIV:nth-of-type(1) > DIV > DIV.bPhtn > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > SPAN > SPAN > DIV:nth-of-type(3) > svg
